summary: Mod changes the flying speed of all arrows in Skyrim and reduces gravity that effect on arrows.
descriptionHtml:
******************************
Better Archery
******************************

******************************
Description:
******************************

I tested many mods that changes arrows behave in game but i couldn't find any useful for me.
So i decided to make my own mod for my personal use but now i want to share it with you :)
What it does?
It changes the flying speed of all arrows in Skyrim and reduces gravity that effect on arrows.

Please add this lines to your Skyrim.ini

[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000
[Combat]
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

(Actor) line increases the max distance that arrows can fly.
(Combat) line adjust crosshair to aim more correctly.


******************************
Settings:
******************************

Arrows speed: +50% - Arrows flying faster :)
Arrows gravity: -40% - Arrows have flatter flying trajectory.
Bolts Speed: Default - Bolts are flying fast so i don't adjust them.
Bolts Gravity: -20% - Bolts have more weight than arrows so they have more parabolic flying trajectory :)


******************************
Install:
******************************

Extract the plugin from the archive and place it in your Skyrim data folder and activate it using Skyrim Launcher.

******************************
Uninstall:
******************************

Remove the plugin from your Skyrim data folder.

******************************
Credits:
******************************

Bethesda: For making Skyrim :)
M.Le Siks (ProG4M3R)<--- me xDDD

This mod is free you can do whatever you want with it but if you want to reupload mod on Nexus or another side
please add proper credits and link to original mod. Enjoy :)
author: ProG4M3R
